title: Why does Travis Scott go by Travis Scott? - Quora

response.answer_text: Travis Scott’s actual name, as you might know, is Jacques Webster. When asked why he chose to go by the name Travis Scott, he told Insider that the name was an ode to his favorite uncle. He was like my favorite uncle. My favorite relative. I looked up to him and shit. That n**** was just smart. Always made good decisions. Good business decisions. The last name, Scott, also comes from his uncle. He used to use the moniker as a nickname The Scott comes from him too, that was his nickname. I was like, man if I wanted to be a rapper I would be this man.

Travis Scott made his stage name from his uncle and Kid Cudi. The name Travis comes from his uncle. He stated that he and his uncle was very close. The name Scott comes from his uncle as well. His uncle’s nickname was Scott.
